no-account: You don't have an account yet?
name: Name
you-are-not-a-member: You are not a member of any group. Create a group or join via link.
paste-code-here: Paste code here and click on join button, or if it is copied on clipboard, just click Join immediately. If you do not have the join link yet, ask your friends.
none-of-these: None of these? Enter your name here
forgot-password-text: If you forget your password, just ask a reminder from us. We will contact you by email, if your email is registered.
user-is-taken-text: Someone already using this user. Choose yourserlf, or sort it out with your friends, who you are.
